page.title: 20Employment
page.content:
The area under survey can best be described as a working class area. Most of the population either work on a farm or at the Paper Mill. There are a sprinkling of bank clerks, commercial representatives and office workers. With the exception of a few living along the A249 at Bobbing there are virtually no professional class of inhabitant in this area north of Sittingbourne. Along with the national trend there has been a significant increase int he level of unemployment in the area over the past three years.
CREDITS. The 20 pages of script have been compiled from surveys, writings and information collected by the pupils of class 5 at Iwade C.P. School.
